column3: â€œI had 4 grams of Pure Kush this weekend and it is some of the best stuff I have ever smoked. It's so sticky, smells dank, taste so beautiful and gives you such an amazing high. I smoked 5 joints of Pure Kush yesterday at the rebelution concert and It made me happy and made me want to dance and hang with people....â€

â€œFirst off, I need to say, this is definitely one of the best strains I have come across! The aroma is subtle and nice; a light mix of citrus, spicy, and skunky smells, and upo...â€

â€œThe dispensary I picked this up from had it labeled Malibu Pure Kush but the genetics were the same. Pure Kush has pushed itself into the top 7 of my favorite indicas of all time. Had a nice euphoric feeling to it too. Knocked out ...â€

â€œStarted smoking soon after I started my HIV meds at the advice of my Doc in 1998.  Cannabis is not legal in IL. and you get what you can find. Having options and reading these reviews was extremely helpful for me so thank you and I hope this helps someone else.

It may be hard to hold in, however, the taste is great. You definitely want to keep smoking more of it due to the ability to acqui...â€

â€œStrong for sure this smooth tasting indica has hints of lemon and skunk under its earthy tones. While the initial buzz goes to the brain the after effects are a soothing body relaxation making this an excellent pain relief choice. It also stimulates appetite and is perfect before bedâ€

It has a great taste it's earthy with a lemon taste that goes into your sinuses.â€

â€œJust picked up some pure og today and looked up some more info: 
Pure OG strain is a classic OG with a fresh fuel-like smell, smooth smoke, and great OG flavor. Pure OG is a San Fernando Valley (SFV) OG Kush F4 IBL (inbred line).

An IBL is a genetically homogeneous strain that grows uniformly from seed. When you cross two different IBL strains for the first time, it is called the F1 generation. When you cross two...â€
